title: The Hollow-Men's Choir
description: A group of 'Hollow-Men'—people whose souls were harvested by the Scourge—have gathered in the 'Shattered-Square' to sing.

turns.narrative: The Shattered-Square is a wasteland of white rubble and tilted statues. The Hollow-Men stand in a circle, their mouths open and perfectly still. The sound coming from them is a harmonic, vibrating hum that makes the loose stones on the ground dance and spin.
turns.choice_a: Join the circle to feel the frequency (Wis DC 13)
turns.consequence_a: Success: You feel a sense of 'Collective-Peace'. (+1 Secret)
turns.choice_b: Disperse the gathering before it's too late (Str DC 12)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You shove a Hollow-Man, and the hum falters. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: A 'Choir-Master'—a Hollow-Man with a crown of rusted barbed-wire—steps to the center.

turns.narrative: The Master's hum is deeper, reaching into the base of your skull. He's trying to tune the whole city to the 'Void-Frequency'.
turns.choice_a: Counter-sing with a 'Song of Life' (Char DC 14)
turns.consequence_a: Success: You break the Master's rhythm. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: The crown snaps, and the hum turns into a scream. (+100 XP)
turns.convergence: The ground beneath the Square begins to tilt and float—gravity is being unmade by the sound.

turns.narrative: You're floating in a cloud of white dust. The Hollow-Men are ascending, their bodies becoming translucent. 'The Weaver... needs... the notes,' the Master whispers.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You anchor them to the ground. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: It's the coordinates to the 'World-Core'. (+1 Lore)
turns.convergence: A 'Frequency-Siphon'—a device of glass and copper—appears in the air, drinking the sound.

turns.narrative: The Siphon is being used by a 'Shadow-Caster'—a man in a high-ward uniform. He's stealing the Hollow-Men's last essence.
turns.consequence_a: Success: The essences return to their hosts. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: He reveals he's 'Harvesting' for the Council. (+1 Secret)
turns.convergence: The Square collapses back to the earth with a violent jolt. The Hollow-Men are now just piles of gray dust.

turns.narrative: The dust is swirling into the shape of a 'Grief-Giant'—a massive entity made of pulverized bone and silver-regret.
turns.consequence_a: Success: The entity dissolves into a cool rain. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You shatter the source of its power. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The Square is silent. The Shadow-Caster has vanished, leaving behind a 'Stolen-Essence-Jar'.

turns.narrative: The Jar is pulsing with a soft, blue light. Inside are the voices of the Hollow-Men—their songs, their names, their lives.
turns.choice_a: Open the Jar to free the souls
turns.consequence_a: Success: The air is filled with a thousand whispers of 'Thank You'. (+10 Morale)
turns.choice_b: Take the Jar to the Temple of Flame
turns.consequence_b: Success: The Priestess can use the essence for 'Re-Souling'. (+1 Gear)
turns.convergence: A 'Hollow-King'—a legendary figure from the Old-Wars—rises from the dust.

turns.narrative: The King has no face, only a void where his heart should be. He offers you his 'Shattered-Blade'.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You gain a weapon that can cut through any lie. (+1 Gear)
turns.consequence_b: Success: He finds a moment of clarity and fades away. (+5 Reputation)
turns.convergence: The sun sets over the Shattered-Square, painting the ruins in a blood-red light.

turns.narrative: You find a 'Choir-Sheet'—a map of the city hidden in musical notation.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You find a 'Void-Tunnel' beneath the High-Ward. (+1 Intel)
turns.choice_b: Give the Sheet to the Tavern-Bard
turns.consequence_b: Success: He turns the struggle into a 'Legendary Ballad'. (+1 Fame)
turns.convergence: The Shadow-Caster's tracks lead into the sewers.

turns.narrative: In the sewers, you find a 'Soul-Press'—a machine used to create Hollow-Men.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You prevent any more souls from being stolen. (+5 Morale)
turns.consequence_b: Success: It now 'Screams' whenever a Shadow-Caster uses it. (+1 Secret)
turns.convergence: The Choir's echo remains in the Square, a hauntingly beautiful reminder of what was lost.

turns.narrative: You stand in the center of the ruins. The air feels lighter, the silence no longer heavy with grief.
turns.choice_a: Accept a gold reward from the survivors
turns.consequence_a: Success: They give you everything they have. (+800 Gold)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You are known as a 'Bringer of Peace'. (+10 Rep)

conclusion: The Hollow-Men's Choir was a call for help from the very foundations of the world. You answered it, but the 'Shadow-Casters' are still looking for more voices.

risk_matrix.penalty: Square consumed. -10 Morale and the 'Grief-Giant' wanders the city for 3 days.
risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor consequences.
